name: HUMANITY FOUNDATION
briefDescription: Visually Impaired students have come from different states like UP, Bihar, Orissa, West Bengal etc. and are referred to us from different blind schools like NAB, and other Blind Schools etc. Walkman, audio cassettes ,i-pods, blank cds are also given for recording the course materials. Additionaly writers are also arranged to student during examinations.A well organized Hostel in a rented place for visually impaired boys with free lodging, boarding, medical care, tuition fees and so many other facilities like Water purification system, audio -video system, Refrigerator ,Laptops etc.
